publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3250 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs—That the Parliament agrees that the following be approved— Draft Code of Recommendations for the Welfare of Livestock: Laying Hens (SE/2002/100); Draft Code of Recommendations for the Welfare of Livestock: Meat Chickens and Breeding Chickens (SE/2002/101); and The draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002. Supported by: Euan Robson*
